enhanced_description: iSDM Consulting (PT. Inti Sumber Daya Manusia) is an HR Management Consultant with extensive experience since its launch in 2005. Based in South Jakarta, Indonesia, the company specializes in providing a comprehensive range of HR services including HR Consulting, HR system development, HR research, HR workshops, HR coaching, assessment services (including as an accredited distributor for Harrison Assessment International since 2007), and training programs. With a track record of assisting over 800 organizations/companies, iSDM Consulting aims to enhance productivity through HR solutions, deliver inspirational programs, and integrate best practices with the latest advancements.
